Old Tantra 1KG14783 Bruno Lain√©
127 XXX001.001 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
1b1-136a2 spros bral don gsal chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba ti la kA pra pa pany+tsA nr+a pra ka Ta tan+d+ra ma hA nA ma
128 XXX001.002 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
136a2-152b1 rgyud thams cad kyi rtse rgyal nam mkha' 'bar ba'i rgyud sarbA gra rA dzA ka sha dzA la tan+t+ra
129 XXX001.003 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
152b1-161a3 rgyud thams cad kyi spyi phud nyi zla bkod pa nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud tan+t+ra sarba tsU DA sUr+ya tsan+d+ra byU ha ga ga a an+ta sa ma tan+t+ra
130 XXX001.004 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
161a3-164a5 nam mkha' 'brug sgrog thog babs klong 'dus spyi rgyal rgya mdud kyi rgyud ga ga na gar+dz+dza ta ra ba Na mai g+ha dz+yo t+yA be shor+m+mi sA mA dza sa mA n+ya dza ya mu drA gran+tha tan+t+ra
131 XXX001.005 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
164a5-176a3 lta ba la shan chen po rin chen sgron ma rtsa ba'i rgyud dr-iSh+Ti ma hA ni ya ma rat+na dI pa mU la tan+t+ra
132 XXX001.006 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
176a3-177b2
133 XXX001.007 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
177b2-178b1 sangs rgyas thig le nyag gcig
134 XXX001.008 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
178b1-179a6
135 XXX001.009 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
179a6-180a6
136 XXX001.010 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
180a6-181a2
137 XXX001.011 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
181a2-182a1
138 XXX001.012 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
182a1-182b3
139 XXX001.013 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
182b3-202b6 rgyud kyi rtse rgyal nyi zla 'od 'bar mkha' klong rnam dag rgya mtsho klong gsal gyi rgyud ces bya ba tan+t+ra gra rA dza sUr+ya tsan+d+ra pra d+hA ts+wa la A ka shA bar+t+ta bi shud+d+ha sa m u drA bar+t+ta pra ka Ta tan+t+ra nA ma
140 XXX001.014 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
202b6-220a5 rdo rje sems dpa' yi ge brgya pa dbang mchog rgyal po'i rgyud ces bya ba badzra sa t+wa shata a k+Sha ra ka a b+hi She kot+ta ma rA dza tan+t+ra nA ma
140 XXX001.015 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
220a5-240b1
badzra sat+wa sha tA k+Sha rA ka y b+hi She kot+ta ma hA rA dza tan tra nA m a
142 XXX001.016 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
240b1-265a3 rdo rje sems dpa' yi ge brgya pa thugs phrin las thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rgyud ces bya badzra sat+wa sha tA k+Sha ra a b+hi She ka tot+ta ma rA dza tsit+ta karma sarba sa ma ya tan+t+ra nA ma
143 XXX001.017 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
265a3-327b6 rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa'i rgyud / lta ba thams cad kyi snying po rin po che rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba ma hA san+ti nin ya mAr+tha sa mU ha tan+t+ra dr#iSh+Ti sarba gar+b+ha rat+na byU ha nA ma
144 XXX001.018 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
328a1-334b7 rdzogs pa chen po rin po che 'khor ba rtsad gcod kyi rgyud ces bya ba ma hA san+ti rat+na saM sA ra mU la ts+tshe da na tan+t+ra nA ma
145 XXX001.019 1KG14783ka11KG21606rnying rgyud
334b7-349a1 rdzogs pa chen po 'khor ba rtsad nas gcod pa chos sku skye med rig pa'i rgyud ces bya ba ma hA san+d+hi saM sA ra mU lats+tshe da na d+harma kA ya a nut+pan+na bid+yA tan+t+ra nA ma
146 XXX002.001 1KG14783kha21KG21607rnying rgyud
1b1-50b1 rdzogs pa chen po lta ba'i yang snying / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa / nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud ces bya ba mahA san+ti dr-iSh+tA tI gar+b+ha / sarba bud+d+ha sha ya / ga ga nor+m+mi bi pu la tan+t+ra nA ma
147 XXX002.002 1KG14783kha21KG21607rnying rgyud
50b1-98b3 rdzogs pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa chos sku gcig tu 'dus par bka' bgros pa'i don / rin po che yon tan kun 'byung gi rgyud ces bya ba san+ti ma hA bud+d+ha sarba sa mA d+hi / d+har+m+ma kA ya e ka sa mu dA ya kA thA sam+ma tAr+tha rat+na gu Na sa mu da ya tan+t+ra nA ma
148 XXX002.003 1KG14783kha21KG21607rnying rgyud
98b3-158a2 rdzogs pa chen po shin tu rnal 'byor sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyud / ye shes chos kyi sku don 'dus rig pa'i gsung */ gsang ba thugs kyi ting nge 'dzin / rang byung bde ba 'khor lo mthar phyin 'bras bu'i rgyud ces bya ba san+ti ma hA a ti yo ga bud+d+ha sarbo da ya tan tra / dz+nyA na d+har+m+ma kA yAr+tha sa mudA ya bid+yA wAkra / guh+ya tsit+ta sa mA d+hi swa yaM b+hu su kha tsakrAn+ta ga ta pha lan+tan+t+ranA ma
149 XXX002.004 1KG14783kha21KG21607rnying rgyud
158a2-181a2 rdzogs pa chen po nges don 'dus pa'i yang snying */ kun tu bzang po ye shes klong gi rgyud / rin po che gser gyi yang zhun zhes bya ba san+ti ma hA ni yA mAr+tha sa ma dA yA' ti gar+b+ha sa man+ta b+ha dra dz+nya na A bar+t+ta tan+t+ra rat+na swar+N+NA ti shr-i ta nA ma
150 XXX002.005 1KG14783kha21KG21607rnying rgyud2
1b1-170a6 rdzogs pa chen po nges don thams cad 'dus pa / ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud / lta bsgom thams cad kyi snying po / rin po che rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba ma hA san+ti ni yA mAr+tha sarba sa mu dA ya / dz+nyA na ga ga na sa mA na tan+ta / dr-iSh+ti b+hA ba na sarba gar+b+ha / rat+na byU ha nA ma
151 XXX002.006 1KG14783kha21KG21607rnying rgyud2
170a6-195a4 rdzogs pa chen po don 'dus rig pa'i gsung rang byung bde ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba san d+hi ma hA ar+tha sa mu dA ya bingabAkaswayam+b+hU su kha tsakra tan+t+ra nA ma
152 XXX003.001 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
1b1-31b4 rdzogs pa chen po ma rig mun pa rab tu sel bar byed pa'i lta ba ye shes gting nas rdzogs pa'i rgyud ces bya ba ma hA san+d+h+ya bid+yA ta maHpra t+yA de sha dr-iSh+ti dz+nyA na nim+na pU ra Na tan+t+ra nA ma
153 XXX003.002 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
32a1-50b7 rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rgyud ces bya ba ma hA san+ti sarba dr-iSh+ti gar+b+ha tan+t+ra nA ma
154 XXX003.003 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
51a1-57a4 rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud ces bya ba ma hA san+ti sa man+ta b+ha dra dz+nyA na pra ka Ta shAstu stan+t+ra nA ma
155 XXX003.004 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
57b1-58b4 rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud phyi ma zhes bya ba ma hA san+ti sa man+ta b+ha dra dz+nyA na pra ka Ta shastu stAn+t+ra pash+tsi ma nA ma
156 XXX003.005 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
59a1-60b1 rdzogs pa chen po kun tu bzang po ye shes gsal bar ston pa'i rgyud / phyi ma'i yang phyi ma zhes bya ba ma hA san+ti sa man+ta b+ha dra dz+nyA na pra ka Ta shA s+t+r-i tan+t+ra pash+tsi ma tsa pash+tsi ma nA ma
157 XXX003.006 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
60b1-62a4 ye shes 'khor lo'i rgyud dz+nyA na tsakra tan+t+ra
158 XXX003.007 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
62a4-73b5 rdzogs pa chen po ye shes 'khor lo gsang ba thugs kyi rgyud ces bya ba ma hA san d+hi dz+nyA na tsakra gu h+ya tset+ta tan+t+ra nA ma
159 XXX003.008 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
74a1-76b5 'jam dpal 'dus pa'i rgyud shrI many+dzu sa mu+u dA ya tan+t+ra
160 XXX003.009 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
77a1-82a6 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs ting 'dzin rtse gcig gi rgyud ces bya ba Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra sa mA d+h+ye ka tan+t+ra nA ma
112 XXX003.010 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
82b1-171b4 snang srid kha sbyor bdud rtsi chu thig 'khor ba thog mtha' gcod pa'i rgyud rgya tshig bkrol ba / A lo ga b+ha ba sa puTA mr-i ta su+u ra bin+du sa sA rA d+yan+ta ts+tshe da na tan+t+ra
113 XXX003.011 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
171b4-179b5 rin po che bcud kyi yang snying thog tha dras thag gcod pa spros gcod rtsa ba'i rgyud rat+na ra sa a ti hr-i da ya A di an+ta radz+dzu ts+tshe da pra pany+tsa ts+tshe da mU la tan+t+ra
114 XXX003.012 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
180a1-188b3 spros pa gcod pa sde lnga'i rgyud pra pany+tsa ts+tshe da pany+tsa se na tan+t+ra
115 XXX003.013 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
188b4-203a5 rin po che bdud rtsi bcud thigs kyi rgyud ces bya ba rat+na a mr-i ta ra sa bin+du tan+t+ra nA ma
116 XXX003.014 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
203b1-241a5 rin po che snang gsal spu gri 'bar ba 'khrul snang thams cad rtsad nas gcod pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud ces bya ba rat+na dI pa karta rI dz+wa la sarba b+h+ra ma mU lats+tshe da A kA sha sa ma tan+t+ra nA ma
117 XXX003.015 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
241b1-246a1 rin po che spyi gnad skyon sel thig le kun gsal kyi rgyud rat+na niHsA mA n+yA do Sha ni ra sa na b+hin+du sa sarba pra ka Ta tan+t+ra
118 XXX003.016 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
246a1-249a3 gter snying rin po che spungs pa'i rgyud ni d+hi hr-i da ya ran+ta kuT tan+t+ra
119 XXX003.017 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
249a3-256a3 thig le ye shes bcud spungs sgron ma 'od 'bar ba'i rgyud bin du dz+nyA na su ra rA shi dA rasmi dz+wa la tan+t+ra
120 XXX003.018 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
256a3-274a3 bdud rtsi bcud thigs sgron ma brtsegs pa'i rgyud a mr-i ta ra sa bin+du dI pa ku Ta tan+t+ra
121 XXX003.019 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
274a3-285a5 snying po bcud spungs nam mkha' klong yangs kyi rgyud hr-i da ya su ra rA shi ga ga nA: bar+t+ta bistA ra tan+t+ra
122 XXX003.020 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
285b1-296a4 thugs kyi yang snying dgongs pa'i bcud 'dus pa / bka' rgyud rnams kyi gsang don bcud dril ba ma rig mun sel nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyud tsit+ta pra hr-i da yA shA ya su+u ra su mu dA ya shud+d+ha gu h+yAr+tha su ra saM hA rA pad+yA ta maHk+Ship+nu sUr+ya tsan+d+ra dz+wa la tan+t+ra
123 XXX003.021 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
296a4-311a4 sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i bcud bsdus ri bo brtsegs pa'i rgyud sarba bud+d+ha:shA ya su ra saM gra ha gi ri ku Ta tan+t+ra
124 XXX003.022 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
311a4-318b5 dri med ka dag gi rgyud / rin po che gsal ba chen po zhes bya ba a ma la shud+d+ha tan+t+ra rat+na mahA pra ka Ta nA ma
125 XXX003.023 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
319a1-358b1 rgyud thams cad kyi rgyal po nyi zla'i snying po 'od 'bar ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho 'khyil pa'i rgyud tan+t+ra sarba rA dza sUr+ya tsan+d+ra hr-i da ya pra b+hA dz+wa lA mr-i ta sa mu dra kuN+Da li tan+t+ra
126 XXX003.024 1KG14783ga31KG21608rnying rgyud
358b1-363b1 skye med ka dag zang ka'i rgyud a dza nu shud+d+hA saM skr-i ta tan+t+ra
XXX004.001 1KG14783nga41KG21609rnying rgyud
1b1- sku thams cad kyi snang ba ston pa / dbang rdzogs pa rang byung chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba kA yA lo kod+di Sh+ta b+hi Shiny+tsa ma hA swa yaM b+hA tan+t+ra nA ma
####
XXX004.001 1KG14783nga41KG21609rnying rgyud
